title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-4.105 - Equipment location
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-4.105 - Equipment location

State Regulations

Equipment is to be located and installed in a way that prevents food contamination and facilitates cleaning the establishment. Unobstructed working spaces are to be provided sufficient to permit employees to perform their duties readily without contamination of food or food-contact surfaces by clothing or personal contact. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
14-4.105

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
